mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_data_analysis ( type, value, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{type}, #{value}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_data_analysis SET value = #{value}, update_time = NOW() WHERE type = #{type}
mapper.select: SELECT i.*, COUNT(l.id) as download_count FROM tb_image_info i JOIN tb_image_access_log l ON i.pathname = l.pathname WHERE l.operation_type = 'DOWNLOAD' AND l.create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY i.id ORDER BY download_count DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT SUM(file_size) FROM tb_image_access_log WHERE operation_type = 'DOWNLOAD' AND create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_image_access_log WHERE operation_type = 'DOWNLOAD' AND create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT DATE(create_time) as date, COUNT(*) as download_count FROM tb_image_access_log WHERE operation_type = 'DOWNLOAD' AND create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY DATE(create_time) ORDER BY date ASC

SELECT DATE(create_time) as date, COUNT(*) as download_count FROM tb_image_access_log WHERE operation_type = 'DOWNLOAD' AND user_id = #{userId} AND create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY DATE(create_time) ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT i.* FROM tb_image_info i JOIN tb_image_access_log l ON i.pathname = l.pathname WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} AND l.operation_type = 'UPLOAD' ORDER BY l.create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
